entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: W 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
